mapper.update: update consumer set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_group = #{userGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, site = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, gender, user_group, password, phone, date, site, notes from consumer
